overview: 'Real Housewife of Auckland' Julia Sloane takes us on an adventure through the world of Kiwi sexuality in this documentary from Lisa Burd. Her journey takes us inside a dungeon, onto a pole-dancing stage, behind the scenes at a sex-toy shop, and inside the very real world of VR sex. We meet a gigolo, brothel owners and sex workers. Insights from Tantric and other sex therapists power Julia’s journey through sexual satisfaction towards a conclusion: that if we talk about it more, and are more positive about its role and our participation in it, life will be better — both in and beyond the bedroom.
title: Let's Talk About Sex
